episodes.synopsis: In the cascading waters of an ancient ravine, the body of 64-year-old Helen Jenkins is found face down with her teeth removed.
episodes.title: Devil's Bridge

episodes.synopsis: At a remote farmhouse, the remains of a 69-year-old are discovered. The investigation into his murder reveals the mountains' bloody past.
episodes.title: Night Music

episodes.synopsis: In the remote village of Penwyllt, the body of young traveler Michael Reynolds is discovered in the murky depths of a quarry lake.
episodes.title: Penwyllt

episodes.synopsis: In the marshlands of Aberystwyth, the body of murdered student Alys Thomas is found abandoned in an old rowing boat.
episodes.title: The Girl in the Water

video.title: Hinterland
video.synopsis: Forsaking London for the rustic landscapes of Wales, a police detective with a troubled soul finds himself in a place with secrets as dark as his own.
